mapper.select: SELECT reportId as pmc_id, diagnosis as pmc_diagnosis, dateVisted as pmc_date FROM PatientMedicalChart WHERE reportId=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE PatientMedicalChart SET diagnosis=#{diagnosis}, dateVisted=#{date} WHERE reportId=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PatientMedicalChart (diagnosis, dateVisted, reportId) VALUES ( #{diagnosis}, #{date}, #{id})
